ticket.title: Improvements to simplified_type for Oracle adapter
ticket.original-body:
This patch refines the types returned by simplified_type for the Oracle AR adapter. This is especially useful when coupled with plugins that do DB reflection, such as auto_migrations. This patch correctly forward/reverse maps between AR migration column types and the actual Oracle column type.
I think it's important to get these fixes into the Oracle adapter for 2.1, since rsim has recently forked the Oracle adapter due to some of these enhancements.
http://blog.rayapps.com/2008/05/13/activerecord-oracle-enhanced-adapter/

I forked original Oracle adapter and now maintain my Oracle enhanced adapter (http://github.com/rsim/oracle-enhanced, http://rubyforge.org/projects/oracle-enhanced/).
It provides all functionality what Oracle adapter provided plus I am constantly adding new features that I extract from my projects.
So please use it and submit patches or feature requests that you would like to get in it.
